content: the first time i saw these two colors together i knew i wanted to design something that combined the two together little did i know that i was going to design a fun shawl this is pattern is addictive you can t wait to start the next row to see what how the colors will look it is easily memorized and you will have the shawl finished in a weekend this is a free pattern only available to the attendees of the 2015 knit and crochet show at this time update the pattern is available for free at http //www marlybird com/free-crochet-shawl/
